languages.text: "Вольный Торговец может проиграть планету, но что-то не слыхал я, чтоб Чорда или там Валанциус такое выкидывали..."
"Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец может проиграть планету, но что-то не слыхал я, чтоб Чорда или там Валанциус такое выкидывали..."

traits.locale_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could lose a planet, but I haven't heard Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pull something like that..."
"Well, a Rogue Trader could lose a planet, but I haven't heard Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pull something like that..."
"Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."
"Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."
"Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

languages.text: “这么说吧，行商浪人随便打个赌，确实能输掉一颗行星。不过，我从来没听说过库尔达，或者冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人干出过这种事情……”
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，行商浪人随便打个赌，确实能输掉一颗行星。不过，我从来没听说过库尔达，或者冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人干出过这种事情……”

languages.text: «Bueno, un Comerciante Independiente sí que podría perder un planeta en una apuesta, pero no he escuchado nunca que Chorda o, yo qué sé, von Valancius hayan hecho algo así...».
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, un Comerciante Independiente sí que podría perder un planeta en una apuesta, pero no he escuchado nunca que Chorda o, yo qué sé, von Valancius hayan hecho algo así...».

languages.text: 「そりゃあ、自由開拓者なら惑星を賭けに出せるだろうけど、チョーダとか知らんけど、フォン・ヴァランシウスがそんな大胆な真似をするとは聞かないからな…」
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: 「そりゃあ、自由開拓者なら惑星を賭けに出せるだろうけど、チョーダとか知らんけど、フォン・ヴァランシウスがそんな大胆な真似をするとは聞かないからな…」

languages.text: "Na ja, ein Freihändler könnte schon einen Planeten verspielen, aber ich habe noch nie gehört, dass ein Chorda oder ein von Valancius so etwas gemacht hätte ..."
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, ein Freihändler könnte schon einen Planeten verspielen, aber ich habe noch nie gehört, dass ein Chorda oder ein von Valancius so etwas gemacht hätte ..."

languages.text: « Enfin... Un libre-marchand pourrait bien parier une planète, mais j'ai jamais entendu dire que Chorda ou von Valancius faisait ce genre de trucs... »
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin... Un libre-marchand pourrait bien parier une planète, mais j'ai jamais entendu dire que Chorda ou von Valancius faisait ce genre de trucs... »

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir, istese kumarda gezegen ortaya koyabilir ama Chorda'nın veya ne bileyim, von Valancius'un öyle bir işe kalkıştığını hiç duymadım."
languages.original_text: "Well, a Rogue Trader could gamble away a planet, but I haven't heard of Chorda or, I don't know, von Valancius pulling a stunt like that..."

traits.locale_text: "Yani bir Hür Tacir komple gezegenle kumar oynayabilir ama Chorda'nın veya ne bileyim, von Valancius'un öyle bir olaya giriştiğini hiç duymadım."
